interface.title: Programming Interface for the Kino XML/CSS processor
interface.author: Eckhart Köppen
interface.description: The Kino XML/CSS processor is a tree/event-based XML parser which is also capable of processing CSS style sheets. It consists of a parser and a DOM interface.

section.name: DOM
section.title: DOM Interface
section.description: The DOM interface contains all functions necessary to inspect and modify the DOM tree created by the parser. It follows closely the DOM Level 1 specification.

function.name: NodeNew
function.description: Creates and initializes a new node
